text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar Edition 15.6” Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen 6-Core Intel Core i7-8750H processor (up to 3.9GHz), GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, 120Hz 3ms display, 8GB DDR4, 1TB SSHD is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS ROG Strix Scar Edition 15.6” Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen 6-Core Intel Core i7-8750H processor (up to 3.9GHz), GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, 120Hz 3ms display, 8GB DDR4, 1TB SSHD is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Elden Ring. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar Edition 15.6” Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen 6-Core Intel Core i7-8750H processor (up to 3.9GHz), GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, 120Hz 3ms display, 8GB DDR4, 1TB SSHD is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix Scar Edition 15.6” Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen 6-Core Intel Core i7-8750H processor (up to 3.9GHz), GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, 120Hz 3ms display, 8GB DDR4, 1TB SSHD is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the trackpad on the ASUS ROG Strix Scar Edition 15.6” Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen 6-Core Intel Core i7-8750H processor (up to 3.9GHz), GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, 120Hz 3ms display, 8GB DDR4, 1TB SSHD. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
